result.execSummary:
The defendant Pedro Damian Gonzalez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash Bond previously posted in the amount of $250.00 has been applied.  The remaining balance is to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Pedro Damian Gonzalez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 2:27 PM: Defendant Pedro Damian Gonzalez in court with attorney John B. Selsing.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.    Interpreter oath given by the Court.  Counsel and Def confirm resolution recited by the Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed.  Plea:  GP  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  Statement by Def:  None offered.  The Court: Accepts resolution and imposes Court Costs Only w/DNA Surcharge - bond to be applied - 60 DTP any balance.  Hispanic Appeal Rights Given.
NOT PUT OF RECORD: Defendant Pedro Damian Gonzalez in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Selsing did not appear.  Further STC Scheduled - NOH Given.
No operation of any motor vehicles without a valid driver's license.

Case Called @ 3:13 PM: Defendant Pedro Damian Gonzalez in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Interpreter oath given by the Court.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Defendant wants counsel.  Earnings discussed w/Defendant.  Based upon earnings, Court believes that Def has the means to retain his own counsel and Court will proceed with that understanding.  Court suggests that Def may wish to speak with the State on his own prior to deciding on counsel issue.  Def confirms he will retain his own counsel.  NGP entered by Court.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Riverside Ruling in favor of the State.  Status conference scheduled for March 24, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
